Hi Maria 

 

Confirmed with @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  that we do not require a tax invoice to cover us for insurance. This is because the claim will not relate to any tax portion. Only tax registration number is required. 

 

Thanks

Jerome
